Thanks Amy. So far everything but contact, techniques, and links pages should be working. I started on one of those last night but I was too tired to finish it up and post it. Maybe later.
   
  The gallery works fine. 
   
  The layout is a "strange banana" layout LOL I told you I was rusty making pages and "cheated" on the layout because I couldnt remember all of the html code. Once I had the layout I wanted the rest was pretty easy. The webhost I used is new so I am hoping they stay free and fast. So far they have allowed unlimited space, unlimited bandwidth, ftp access, and the upload of any file type that will be posted on your website including the p1 filter. Hopefully it will stay that way as they become more popular.
   
  www.strangebanana.com
   
  www.xm.com
   
  Theres 2 links for those who need it.
   
  Misty
   
   
  

LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
          so far the contact me, ITC Galleryand links are dead
all the software links are good and the other links work great
i like the layout of the page, its nice and clean and easy but doesnt look like a 10 year old kid made it lol. Looks like someone who knows what theyre doing made it!
nice job!

Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:      
  No problem. I am still workin on the site it will be slow going I am just working alot the next month so I will try and finish some on my days off. Eventually I plan on putting links to the software and stuff but you can go check it out if ya want. Some of the links are working and the ones that arent say under construction when ya hold your mouse over it. I made it for 1024x768 screen size but it should work for the others just as well. It just moves some pics around on other sizes such as 800x600.
   
  http://misty.xm.com
   
  Misty

LON3_S7AR <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
      yeah thats the one clear voice, i still have your settings for that one in yahoo mailbox mails that i saved lol
thanks alot!

Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:       
  I use audacity and clear voice denoiser. Some people like to use evpmaker and a few other programs.
   
  Misty
